author: mandrenguyen
body:
#### PR description:

HiMix is the primary type of MC dataset used for heavy ions, where we overlay a pp signal on a background from the Hydjet generator. 
These use the same mechanism as pp PU workflows.  Hydjet GEN-SIM was produced in 14_1_0_pre7.

#### PR validation:

Was tested with 332.  New wfs are 330,331,332

<!-- Please delete the text above after you verified all points of the checklist  -->

A backport to 14_1_X will be needed.
title: Add 2024 HiMix MC RelVal workflows
